text: Echo: I usually will bring a piece of chocolate in my backpack.
Moderator: Really?
Echo: Yeah
Moderator: Like everyday?
Echo: Yes, almost......
Jake: I also have like chocolate and there is something about the M&M's.
Jake: The thing that doesn't now in hand.
Jake: I think is pretty cool though M&M's taste is not as good as other chocolate.
Jake: Like real chocolates.
Moderator: The "real" chocolate...
Jake: The feel is that it doesn't melt in your hand, it is very good.
Jake: And, you can just play with them in your hand. And maybe eat one or two.
Moderator: you play with the M&M's?
Penny: Yeah....I agree with him cuz I have received a M&M present.
Penny: with my image on the candy, so it's mean something special to me and I also bought the toys the M&M's toys for my friends and it's meaningful to me
Moderator: Yes, so if you have mentioned that M&M's is meaningful to you, so do you have like...... when you are talking about like M&M's what reminds you?
Moderator: Reminds you about what?
Jake: Eh.....I once went to London and there is a huge M&M's store, a theme store.
Jake's cell phone rang. (Jake apologized)
Jake: Um....A little bit of childish but very colorful and doesn't....
Jake: You just hanging around the store and it makes you feel kind of like going back to your younger age.
Jake: And feel very pleasant.
Jake: And happiness?
Iris: Yeah....I also.......you know um.......new M&M's store just open in Nanjing Road in Shanghai.
Iris: So I came there......um.....I came there with my friends and we are found a lot of colorful chocolate in different shape of bottles and they are very attracting
Iris: And a lot of colorful T-shirts and toys and that I think um...... wondering that store is kind of happiness.
Moderator: The happiness?
Iris: Yeah
Iris: And make you feel back to children.......
Moderator: Back to children....... Did others have like experience in M&M's store?

Matt: There......there is......... I think if you take them home as a bag you can put them into like a jar or bowl they look nice, so I just remembered you know going my grandma's house, she always have big bowl of M&M's out
Matt: And we will try to get them as much as we could, but they were just look so nice in the bowl so I think that was kinds of what's reminds me
Moderator: You think they look nice in a bowl.....
Matt: Yes!!!! I just think of my grandmother's house when she used that bowl out. And me and my brother will fight to see who can get there first to get the good colors.
Moderator: Yeah....so M&M's reminds you some of like the childhood.....
Matt: Yeah.....(Nodded)
Moderator: How about the other, do M&M's have like something related to you?
Zoe: Um.... for me M&M always means is I has good taste I quite like the taste.
Moderator: The taste?
Zoe: Yeah.... both candy taste and the chocolate taste
Echo: When I talk about M&M's I will think about the color (Moderator: the color.....) because I like green and purple so every time when I see M&M's I will choose these two colors and ignore others
Moderator: Ignore the others? (Echo: Yes.) Because you like the other color? (Echo: Yes.)
Moderator: Do you have like this in......?
Mia: When people mention M&M's, the first thing comes to my mind is its commercial. There is a big candy in each of it.
Mia: And I could remember the one is coming to my world.
Moderator: You remember.......when you talk about M&M's the first thing you remember is the commercial?
Mia: Yeah....(Nodded)

Mia: And......um......I have a little brother who quite likes the M&M's and when I come to his.....his home.......and he will give me some candies for me which.......which.... he is very cherish and he will give me some
Mia: But I feel very moving because he very like it and he will like to give me some
Moderator: So you are very moved by like he gave it to you (Mia: Yeah......)

Penny: Um...the first thing came to my mind is like this movement, like...... I play with the toy, I click um.....its arms and the M&M's just um.....jump out from the corner. It's funny! I love to play with this toy.

Moderator: You love to play with it...... So, when you have talked about like taste, somebody talks about colors, so what is like if you the most um.....I mean you like M&M's most? Like the taste or the color or the toy or anything?

Matt: The versatility. You can put them on anything. You can put them on the ice cream, you can put them on cookies, you can put them on anything, and or you just leave them alone. So in fact they can go anywhere, that's pretty good.
Moderator: So that's the way that you usually eat M&M's?

Matt: Oh...um...I don't usually eat them but I like like cookies with them on it or put them on the ice cream. You know that sort of things, it's when I like them best. But, um......they are just more flexible than other candies they go well a lot more........
Moderator: Go well a lot more on other things.....(Matt nodded)
Echo: I think M&M is a good decoration for the cookies, it makes the cookies and cakes more tasty and delicious
